item.title: Report X-2024072333
item.description:
Report X-2024072333

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-01T15:14:26+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-22
  • City: LITTLE ROCK
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS CALLED FOR LEAKING HAZMAT PACKAGE ON BOXLINE# 2 SLIDE AT 19:47 MONDAY DURING THE TWILIGHT SORT. PACKAGE WAS WET ON BOTTOM OF CARDBOARD ON THE BOXLINE SLIDE. RESPONDER CLEANED UP AND PLACED LEAKING PACKAGE AND CONTENTS FOLLOWING DECISION TREE AND FLAMMABLE LIQUID RESPONSE SHEET WEARING PROPER PPE. DMN WAS TAKEN TO DMN PROCESSING AREA FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2024072198
item.description:
Report X-2024072198

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-31T21:13:28+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-25
  • City: PINE BLUFF
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNION PACIFIC RAILROAD COMPANY INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 7500
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: Car appeared to have been hard coupled from humping operations that caused a crumpling of the A end left side pushing the truck assembly up to the first hopper and the stubsill down at the coupler. This crumpling caused a tear in the well of the A end hopper approximately 6' long by 1/2" wide.

item.title: Report X-2024071917
item.description:
Report X-2024071917

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-26T18:15:58+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-16
  • City: LITTLE ROCK
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS CALLED TO A LEAKING PACKAGE AT UNLOAD SECTION ON BAY# 4 ON THE TWILIGHT SORT. RESPONDER PICKED UP A LEAKING CORROSIVE HAZ MAT IN THE TRAILER. RESPONDER PLACED THE LEAKING PACKAGE AND ALL CONTAMINATED MATERIAL IN A SPILL TRAY FOLLOWING PROPER DECISION TREE AND CORROSIVE RESPONSE SHEET. DAMAGE PACKAGE WAS TAKEN TO DMP PROCESSING CENTER FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.
